titleStmt.title: The case and cure of a deserted soule, or, A treatise concerning the nature, kindes, degrees, symptomes, causes, cure of, and mistakes about spirituall desertions by Jos. Symonds ...
titleStmt.author: Symonds, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Luke Fawne, and S. Gellibrand, at the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Churchyard,
